doc.title: Nanatsukaze no shima monogatari
doc.plot: The Island of Seven Winds is a world of picture books full of marvelous tales. Then one day, a malevolent Dark Wind howled through out the island, tearing away every story ever told. The spirits of the books and imagery plead with Professor Gap, a chubby dragon-like being, to create new stories and adventures, so the island will be rebuilt. Through his travels on the islands, the good Professor will soon come to realize that there is more to meet the eye in this ideal world of stories and illustrations...
